title.rendered: Free Kids Box Set 12/17 + Free $10 G.C. + Putty

content.rendered:
Holiday Treasury Giveaway

On Saturday, December 17th, mention this newsletter and get a FREE Animal Ark Holiday Treasury! Promotion is good at all four Gottwals Books locations while supplies last. Giveaway for children between the ages of 6 and 10. Limit one treasury per family. Titles include: Kitten in the Candycorn, Colt on Christmas Eve, Husky with a Heart, and Bunny in a Basket. Suggested retail value is $12.99.

 

Free $10 Gift Card

There is still time! Through Christmas Eve, get a FREE $10 gift card for every $25 gift card you buy. Limit 10 free gift cards per person. Gift cards must be redeemed after 12/25.

 

Crazy Aaron’s Thinking Putty

New to our stores!  Glow in the dark, heat reactive, magnetic, and UV light reactive… These awesome stocking stuffers go way beyond the silly putty you remember.  Crazy Aaron’s Thinking Putty can now be found at Gottwals Books!

 

25% OFF Military Toys

Get 25% off of military toys! Toys offered exclusively at the Warner Robins location.

 

Christmas Hours

We will close at 4:00 p.m. on Christmas Eve and be closed on Christmas Day. Regular business hours will resume on Monday, December 26th.
